Title: Permits a legislative body to overturn an emergency order of a chief executive upon a vote of two-thirds of its members
Summary: Permits a legislative body to overturn an emergency order of a chief executive after six months of such order upon a vote of two-thirds of its members.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to permitting a local legislative body to overturn an emergency order of a chief executive upon a vote of two-thirds of its members
